title: Saara Lehtonen
bioParagraphs: Saara Lehtonen is a freelance actress, singer and a voice talent. Saara has worked mostly as a musical artist in professional theatre productions for over a decade.

Most beloved roles for Saara have been Éponine in Les Misérables (Tampere Theatre 2013), Georgie Bukatinsky in Full Monty, (Samppalinna summer theatre 2012) and Linda in Bloodbrothers (Tampere Theatre 2012).

Alongside theatre productions Saara also works as a voice talent. During her career Saara has been the Finnish voice for characters like Pinkie Pie (My Little Pony Friendship Magic), Dora (Dora the Explorer), Everest (Paw Patrol), Toralie (Monster High).
